languages.text: "Порадуйся тому, что ты жив. А всем своим епитимьям еще найдешь время... если мы сбежим отсюда".
"Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."
languages.original_text: "Порадуйся тому, что ты жив. А всем своим епитимьям еще найдешь время... если мы сбежим отсюда".

traits.locale_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你还活着，就好好偷着乐吧。你会有时间赎罪的……假如我们能逃出去的话。”
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: “你还活着，就好好偷着乐吧。你会有时间赎罪的……假如我们能逃出去的话。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Réjouissez-vous déjà d'être vivant. Vous pourrez vous repentir tout votre saoul... si on réussit à sortir d'ici. »
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: « Réjouissez-vous déjà d'être vivant. Vous pourrez vous repentir tout votre saoul... si on réussit à sortir d'ici. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Dé gracias por estar vivo. Ya podrá expiar sus culpas todo lo que quiera... si salimos de aquí».
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: «Dé gracias por estar vivo. Ya podrá expiar sus culpas todo lo que quiera... si salimos de aquí».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「生きてることを喜びなさいよ。望みどおり、償う時間はたっぷりある…ここを出ればだけどね」
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: 「生きてることを喜びなさいよ。望みどおり、償う時間はたっぷりある…ここを出ればだけどね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Seid froh, dass Ihr lebt. Büßen könnt Ihr später noch, so lange Ihr wollt ... falls wir das überleben."
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: "Seid froh, dass Ihr lebt. Büßen könnt Ihr später noch, so lange Ihr wollt ... falls wir das überleben."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

languages.text: "Nefes aldığına şükret. Buradan çıkabilirsek hatalarını telafi etmek için bolca vaktin olacak."
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're alive. You'll have time to do all the atoning you want... if we make it out of here."

traits.locale_text: "Nefes aldığına şükret. Buradan çıkabilirsek hatalarını telafi etmek için bolca vaktin olacak."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
